payload.name: Margarita
payload.recipe: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a glass with a salted rim.

payload.name: Martini
payload.recipe: Stir gin and vermouth with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with an olive.

payload.name: Mojito
payload.recipe: Muddle mint and sugar in a glass. Add rum, lime juice, and soda water. Stir and garnish with mint leaves.

payload.name: Cosmopolitan
payload.recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with a lime twist.

payload.name: Old Fashioned
payload.recipe: Muddle sugar and bitters in a glass. Add bourbon and ice. Stir and garnish with an orange peel.

payload.name: Negroni
payload.recipe: Stir gin, vermouth, and campari with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with an orange peel.
